alert.note: Alert for Menard; Schleicher; Sutton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 6:57PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Schleicher, west central Menard and western Sutton Counties through 745 PM CST... At 657 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sonora, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sonora, Eldorado, Adams, Us-277 Near The Sutton- Schleicher County Line, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 2596 And Ranch Road 864, The Intersection Of I- 10 And Ranch Road 1989 and The Intersection Of Us- 190 And Ranch Road 2084. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 387 and 410. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
